Agbor is a kingdom in Delta state: Ika people speak the Ika dialect of the Igbo language.
The Aladja-Itakpe-Ajaokuta rail crosses through the city of Agbor to the two steel hubs of Nigeria (Aladja and Ajaokuta)

Nigeria. The indigenes of Agbor town ar: Chinedu (2012). Grama Ika La Grammaire Ika: Essentials of Ika Grammar.
